thread.title: Lamar Odom regains consciousness, family and friends say

author: senh
title: Lamar Odom regains consciousness, family and friends say
text: BING NEWS: Lamar Odom regains consciousness, family and friends say LAS VEGAS (AP) — Lamar Odom has regained consciousness, and is communicating — speaking and even giving a thumbs up from his hospital bed — just days after being found in extremely critical condition at a Nevada brothel, loved ones said. It's the ... 10/16/2015 - 2:42 pm | View Link Source: Lamar Odom regains consciousness, speaks from hospital bed LAS VEGAS — A family representative said Lamar Odom has regained consciousness, and was speaking and even offered a thumbs-up from his hospital bed, just days after being found in extremely critical condition at a Nevada brothel. Alvina Alston ... 10/16/2015 - 2:01 pm | View Link Lamar Odom Update: Off Life Support, Breathing on His Own After Drugs Overdose in Vegas Brothel Khloe Kardashian’s ex-husband Lamar Odom was found nearly dead after days of partying ... the extent of which won’t be known unless he regains consciousness.
